t.t-value: product_variant and product_variant.get_selector_images() or product and product.get_selector_images()

div.t-attf-class: variant_description_main_div #{'d-none' if (str(value_id.id) != selected_product_id and j != 0) else ''}
variant_description_main_div #{'' if (str(value_id.id) != selected_product_id and j != 0) else ''}

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-secondary float_left plus_button #{'equal_quantity' if bundle_id.temp_quantity_equal == True else ''}
btn btn-secondary float_left plus_button #{'equal_quantity' if bundle_id.temp_quantity_equal == True else ''}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'} #{'add-to-cart-fade' if ( value_id.unpublish_product == True) else ''}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'} #{'add-to-cart-fade' if ( value_id.unpublish_product == True) else ''}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'} #{'add-to-cart-fade' if ( value_id.unpublish_product == True) else ''}
btn btn-primary btn-sm custom_add_to_cart_bundle #{'' if (j == 0 ) else 'd-none'}

t.div: This product is not published on website.

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary btn-sm float-right document_button #{'' if (temp_docu != 0 ) else 'add-to-cart-fade'}

div.t-attf-class: carousel-item active new_image_ext #{'' if (value_id.unpublish_product == False) else 'opacoty-for-out-for-stock'}

label.t-attf-style: background-color:#{value_id.html_color or value_id.name if not value_id.is_custom else ''}
label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{'active' if first_possible_combination[variant_id_index] == value_id else ''} #{'custom_value' if value_id.is_custom else ''}
